Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CA(1-7)M(4-11) (Synthetic AMPs, hybrid peptide, cecropin A(1-7)+melittin(4-11), Lys-rich, UCLL1)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (87.5%) toCA(1-7)M(3-10)K:33%; L: 20%, V: 13%.Activity: lethal concentration (LC): active against E. coli D21 (LC 0.6 uM), P. aeruginosa OT97 (LC 4 uM), B. subtilis (LC 0.6 uM), B. megaterium (LC 0.5 uM), S. aureus Cowan 1 (LC 8 uM), and S. pyogenes (LC 0.7 uM).Antimalarial activity:P. falciparum (IC50 8 uM).In vitro toxicity: sheep RBC (LC >600 uM), not hemo.lytic.Structure:  helical in 20% hexafluoroisopropanol (HFIP).
Literature Information.Author: Andreu D, Ubach J, Boman A, WÃ¥hlin B, Wade D, Merrifield RB, Boman HG. 1992
Literature Information.Title: Shortened cecropin A-melittin hybrids. Significant size reduction retains potent antibiotic activity.
